headline: Is Zoetis (ZTS) Offering An Opportunity After A 24% One-Year Share Price Pullback
summary: If you have been wondering whether Zoetis is starting to look better value after a rough patch, this article explains what the current price might be indicating. The stock closed at US$124.40, with returns of 0.7% over the last 30 days and a 24.4% decline over the past year. This may signal that the market has been rethinking its expectations and risk profile. Recent coverage of Zoetis has focused on its position in animal health and its portfolio of veterinary medicines and vaccines. This...
